event.details: Welcome to TinyKart! Whether you're an old player of LittleBigPlanet Karting or completely new, we welcome you. We hope you have fun cruising around the Imagisphere at lightning fast speeds with rockets, gadgets, and whositswhatsits! Don't forget to read the official rules of the server, and check out what the community has made. Now go on - join your sack friends!
event.subject: Welcome!
